group.groupClose: Group has been closed by admin, Now only admin can send messages!
group.groupOpen: Group has been opened by admin, Now participants can send messages!
group.groupInfoRestr: Group info has been restricted, Now only admin can edit group info!
group.groupInfoOpen: Group info has been opened, Now participants can edit group info!
group.groupSubject: Group Subject has been changed to {subject}

private.blockCall: Your number is blocked for calling bots, contact the owner to unblock.
